title: Adaptive Connectivist MOOC Design: Strengthening Practical Competencies for Social Sector Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and practical experience in social sector contexts
context.additional_context: Mobile-Based Short-Term Training Course for Customized Learning Experiences Targeting Current Elementary Social Studies Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify optimized social studies content with 80% accuracy based on their individual learning styles and profiles.
Learners can complete personalized microlearning modules three or more times per week through an adaptive recommendation system.
Learners can adjust their learning paths two or more times based on formative assessment analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
